posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am selling a couple T206's HOFers:

Tinker EPDG (looks trimmed, but edge looks nice, so I am going to call it trimmed) $150 SOLDD
Marquard Follow Through Tolstoi $120  SOLDDDDD!!!

Cash comes first, but would consider trades involving Piedmont 350 or AB 350 Eddie Collins cards, or I also really need a low grade Piedmont 42 HOFer.  Paypal payment owed is best, but anything will do if you want to work something out.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
